data.name: Javier Saviñon
data.Profile: Hi I’m Javier  Saviñon, also known as “mengeroshi” in crypto space. I’m frontend developer, mengerian monetary theory expert and cryptocurrency’s enthusiast. I am founder of Hashger, a blockchain consultancy and early member team of Domitai, a cryptocurrency exchange in Mexico. Did I already mention that I like cryptocurrencies?
